bug.short_desc: Splitpane scrollbar not dragable on first focus

long_desc.thetext:
Having two splitted panes with one pane having a scrollbar, this scrollbar is not dragable on first click if the pane with the scrollbar has lost focus.
To reproduce use the demo viewer.
1. Open a demo e.g. http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/demobrowser/index.html#ui~Font.html
2. Put the focus in the right pane by clicking into the demo area
3. Try to drag the scrollbar of the left pane (showing the demo tree).
This is not the expected behaviour. The scrollbar reacts on mouse over and shows the active state, which implies "you can drag me".

Thanks for the report. Interesting behavior! But it seems to be an issue with the demo browser as you can see in the split pane demo itself: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/demobrowser/index.html#widget~SplitPane.html
